underlying_goal: Organize and map variables between an 8-STEP registration workflow state machine and a 19-item production check flow state machine, creating traceability between inputs and verification checks
friction_detail: On first request to display the state diagram, Claude investigated the wrong scope and had to be corrected to focus on the chk directory specifically.
brief_summary: User wanted to organize variable mappings between two state machines (registration workflow and check flow), and Claude created a variable_mapping.md file and began planning implementation, but the session ended before full completion.
